projects: [{"title":"Temporal Knowledge Graph Completion","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"Apr 2019","description":"• Developed bi-directional LSTM based architecture for Learning Sequence Encoders using Time-Aware Embeddings in Open World Temporal Knowledge Graph Completion(T-KGC) task for Link Prediction on ICEWS2014, ICEWS2005-15 and WikiData datasets.• Designed Time-Aware versions of TransE and DistMult scoring funtions along with associating GloVe Embeddings to get MRR and Hits@10 boost upto 2.5x for WikiData dataset encorporating heterogenous date serialization standards."},{"title":"Neural Machine Translation for Low-Resource Languages ","start_date":"Jul 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"• Converted scraped Sanskrit text from Vedabase using Scrapy to raw images with 4 noises to feed into Tesseract OCR for training data.• Trained model by collaboration of CopyNet wrapper upon tensorflow-nmt with BPE vocabulary to achieve better Bleu metric.• Scraped word segmentation data from Digital Corpus of Sanskrit and applied split-highlighting by aligning Unsandhied and Sandhied texts.• Trained the Seq2Seq Architecture with different sized vocabularies using sentenecepiece model to get Precision and Recall >98%."},{},{"title":"Word Similarity Index","start_date":"Aug 2017","end_date":"Dec 2017","description":"The objective of the Project is sensing Similarity between any two English words in the scale of 10 with the accuracy of>55%.Developing Word Similarity Algorithm using Big Data Sets of word to word node connectivity.Implementing the whole Project in Python with NetworkX Package.The background of NLP is significantly used"},{},{"title":"D2D Communication in C-RAN Architecture","start_date":"Aug 2017","end_date":"Nov 2017","description":"The prevailing Door to Door communication architecture is having undesired complicacies which can be minimized bysplitting front-haul function between Remote Radio Heads and Baseband Units.The split will be implementing some other function and eradicate the extreme complicacies prevailing.Miscellaneous section of optimization in D2D communication in context of Machine Learning is also considered"},{"title":"Solution of Optimality(Genetic Algorithms) ","start_date":"Jan 2017","end_date":"Apr 2017","description":"Worked on Two Bar Truss Design Problem.The Problem Statement was to maximize the stress below certain upper bound.Accomplished by applying Non-Dominated Sorting Genetic Algorithm."}]
